structure.unit: ARTICLE LI. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY HIV HEALTH SERVICES PLANNING COUNCIL.

text.section:
Sec. 2-551. Creation and purposes.
There is hereby created and established the Miami-Dade County HIV Health Services Planning Council. The Council's purpose is to enable the County to apply for, receive and allocate financial assistance under the Ryan White Act and advise the Board of County Commissioners on HIV/AIDS related health services issues.
